message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTERNATEID_FV_TYPECODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Contact type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_FV_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The end date of the primary alternative ID has passed.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_RNFE_PRIMARY
message.locale: There was an error reading the primary alternative ID for this client.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_ADDRESS_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The end date of the primary address has passed.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_SENSITIVE
message.locale: You do not have access to this client's details.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_NOMINEE_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You do not have the required privileges to maintain this data.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_CASEMEMBER_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: The client selected has a higher sensitivity and can only be added as a case member by a user who has the same sensitivity level or greater.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XRV_END_DATE
message.locale: The end date must be before "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XRV_START_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: The start date must be before "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XRV_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date must be after "%1s" start date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_FV_CONTACTNAME_SHORT
message.locale: The contact name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Address type must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_MODIFY_PRIMARY_ADDRESS_ID
message.locale: You cannot modify the primary address so that it is no longer primary. Please select another address and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_XRV_CANCEL_PRIMARY_ADDRESS
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary address. Please create another address and assign it as the primary address before attempting to delete this address.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYER_FV_REGISTRATIONDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Registration date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYER_FV_TRADINGNAME_SHORT
message.locale: The employer trading name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: INF_EMPLOYER_FV_ENDDATE_SET
message.locale: Employer end date is set.

message.name: ERR_FV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this record as it has been canceled.
You cannot modify this record as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_INFOPROVIDER_FV_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: The information provider name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_INFOPROVIDER_XFV_REGISTRATIONDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Registration date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_FV_DOB_EMPTY
message.locale: Date of Birth must be entered if the Date of Birth Verification is selected.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_DOB_DOBVI
message.locale: The Date of Birth and Date of Death must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_DOD_DOB
message.locale: The date of death must not be earlier than the date of birth.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_DOD_DODVI
message.locale: Date of Death must be entered if the Date of Death Verification is selected.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_DOD_LARGE
message.locale: The date of death must not be a future date.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_REGISTRATIONDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Registration date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_REG_DATE_DOB
message.locale: Registration date must not be earlier than person date of birth.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_REG_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Registration date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XRV_PIN_INCORRECT
message.locale: That is not the correct PIN.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARYEMAIL_CANCEL_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary email address. Please create another email address and assign it as the primary email address before attempting to delete this email address.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARYEMAIL_MODIFY_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot modify the primary email address so that it is no longer primary. Please select another email address and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARYPHONENUMBER_CANCEL_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary phone number. Please create another phone number and assign it as the primary phone number before attempting to delete this phone number.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARYPHONENUMBER_MODIFY_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot modify the primary phone number so that it is no longer primary. Please select another phone number and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_FV_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: The name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_PROFORMATEMPLATE_RNFE
message.locale: Pro forma template ID "%1s" was not found.

message.name: ERR_PROFORMATEMPLATE_WITH_LOCALE_RNFE
message.locale: A suitable pro forma template could not be found while sending '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_PROFORMATEMPLATE_WITH_LOCALE_FOR_BATCHPROCESSING_RNFE
message.locale: Pro forma template ID "%1s" was not found for Concern Role ID "%2n" - "%3s" while generating "%4s".

message.name: INF_PROFORMATEMPLATE_WITH_LOCALE_FOR_BATCHPROCESSING_RNFE
message.locale: Successfully generated "%1s" for Concern Role ID "%2n" - "%3s".

message.name: ERR_REGISTRATION_DATE_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: A registration date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVSUPPLIER_FV_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: The service supplier name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_MAXIMUMPAYMENTRATE_LARGE
message.locale: Maximum Payment Rate must not be greater than 100.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_MAXIMUMPAYMENTRATE_SMALL
message.locale: Maximum Payment Rate must not be less than 0.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: The utility name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_REGISTEREDNAME_SHORT
message.locale: Registered names must be at least 2 characters long.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_XFV_REGISTRATIONDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Registration date must be specified.

message.name: INF_CONCERNROLE_ENDDATE_PASSED
message.locale: An end date has been set for %1s.

message.name: INF_CONCERNROLE_STATUS_CHANGED
message.locale: The status of the %1s has changed from %2s to %3s.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XRV_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You cannot alter this client's sensitivity to one that is higher than your own.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_FV_GENDER
message.locale: Gender must be specified.

message.name: INF_REFERENCE_NUMBER
message.locale: Reference Number

message.name: ERR_INFOPROVIDER_FV_PREFERRED_LANGUAGE_EMPTY
message.locale: Information provider preferred language must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARYBANKACCOUNT_MODIFY_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot modify the primary bank account so that it is no longer primary. Please select another bank account and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARYWEBADDRESS_MODIFY_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot modify the primary web address so that it is no longer primary. Please select another web address and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARYWEBADDRESS_CANCEL_FAILURE
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary web address. Please create another web address and assign it as the primary web address before attempting to delete this web address.

message.name: ERR_FV_CURRENCYTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Currency type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_PAYMENTFREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: Payment frequency must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_METHODOFPMT_EMPTY
message.locale: Method of payment must be specified.

message.name: TEXT_ANONYMOUS
message.locale: Anonymous

message.name: ERR_FV_UPPERTRADING_NAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on Trading Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_FV_UPPERREGISTERED_NAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on Registered Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_FV_UPPER_NAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XRV_PERSON_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date must be after the date of birth of "%1s" of "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XRV_NONPERSON_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date must be after the registration date of "%1s" of "%2d".
